title: Koi to Senkyo to Chocolate: Stray Little Cat
original_name: 恋と選挙とチョコレート SLC〈Stray Little Cat〉
sinopse: In Takafuji Academy, clubs of all kinds exist, including a Food Research Club. One day, during the student council election campaign, they find themselves a target of club disbandment under new financial reforms. They have decided to enroll into the elections. Will they be able to prevent their club from getting disbanded?
